title: Renaissance in Uncertainty: Luxury Builds on Its Rebound - Bain & Company
summary: The global luxury goods market underwent significant growth in 2022 and is expected to continue expanding through the next decade, with a focus on personal luxury goods. The industry demonstrated resilience despite economic challenges, particularly in regions such as the US, Europe, and new emerging markets like India. Various categories within luxury goods experienced growth, with a strong emphasis on consumer trends and evolving market dynamics.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 424330 - Women's, Children's, and Infants' Clothing and Accessories Merchant Wholesalers, 451210 - Book Stores, 452319 - All Other General Merchandise Stores, 454111 - Electronic Shopping and Mail-Order Houses

title: Bain Study: Luxury Spending Has Become More Recession Resistant - SGB Media
summary: The luxury goods market has shown resilience and growth, highlighted by increased spending from top customers, a focus on customer-centricity, and investments in modernization and digital transformation. Sales of personal luxury goods have bounced back, with double-digit growth across all categories, fueled by a return to social events and a resurgence in travel and office activities. Global profits in the luxury sector have rebounded following the pandemic, with a positive outlook for continued growth and expansion, particularly driven by young consumers and online channels.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 424330 - Women's, Children's, and Infants' Clothing and Accessories Merchant Wholesalers; 424340 - Footwear Merchant Wholesalers; 424340 - Men's and Boys' Clothing and Furnishings Merchant Wholesalers; 424120 - Stationery and Office Supplies Merchant Wholesalers

title: The fashion exec's guide to circularity - Vogue Business
summary: The fashion industry is focusing on circular fashion to reduce waste, but experts warn about neglecting social impacts, especially in the Global South.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 448190 - Other Clothing Stores, 541613 - Marketing Consulting Services, 541820 - Public Relations Agencies, 812990 - All Other Personal Services
